name: Security Software Discovery by Powershell
description:
Adversaries may attempt to get a listing of security software, configurations, defensive tools, and sensors that are installed on a system or in a cloud environment.
This may include things such as firewall rules and anti-viru
query: (powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*[Gg][Ee][Tt]\-[Pp][Rr][Oo][Cc][Ee][Ss][Ss].*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*\.[Dd][Ee][Ss][Cc][Rr][Ii][Pp][Tt][Ii][Oo][Nn].*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:/.*\-[Ll][Ii][Kk][Ee].*/ AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(/.*\".*[Vv][Ii][Rr][Uu][Ss].*\".*/ OR /.*\".*[Cc][Aa][Rr][Bb][Oo][Nn][Bb][Ll][Aa][Cc][Kk].*\".*/ OR /.*\".*[Dd][Ee][Ff][Ee][Nn][Dd][Ee][Rr].*\".*/ OR /.*\".*[Cc][Yy][Ll][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee].*\".*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(powershell.file.script_block_text:*get\-process* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*.Description* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:*\-like* AND powershell.file.script_block_text:(*\"*virus*\"* OR *\"*carbonblack*\"* OR *\"*defender*\"* OR *\"*cylance*\"*))`
